answers.answer: well, in infants the smell of syrup can suggest diabetes. is that your only symptom?
that and i've been urinating more frequently for the past month, almost 2 months. My dad has a glucose test kit that I'm going to borrow tomorrow and see if that's a problem.
let me know, how it turns out. I hope you get well soon

question: My hands, they smell like maple syrup! I know it sounds insane, but they literally smell like maple syrup. At work today, a coworker asked if I had pancakes for lunch... I havent had pancakes in like 2 weeks. I havent eaten any syrup in 2 weeks or more, and I havent touched anything like that. What in the world is going on with me???
title: maple syrup?
